title: Client Freeze and time penalty in ranked queue.
body:
This has happened a couple of times now, and only seems to occur when these circumstances happen.

Ranked Solo/Duo. Was last pick on my team, bans had gone through and my "declared pick" was chosen by the other team. I didn't change my pick as I wanted to see what the other team chose, but the other teams last pick just sits on 0s. I could access masteries and runes, but couldn't pick a champion as it was still showing the other team picking. After maybe 30/40 seconds of this I get kicked back to the lobby with a 6 minute timeout. Felt pretty miffed as there was nothing I could do. Anyone else have this issue with these conditions?

Current patch, with no mods or anything.

replies.body:
It sounds like your connection to the lobby was interrupted or timed out for some reason since the timer ticked all the way down and then just froze. There might be something blocking your network from keeping a stable connection, but let's be sure to cover all our bases by going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Hit me up if you have any questions or issues while troubleshooting. Be sure to test those changes in a custom game to avoid any penalties too!
